name: On User Save
script:
same_user=frappe.db.get_list("User Permission",filters={'user':doc.email,'allow':'Company','for_value':doc.represents_company},fields={'*'})
if not same_user:
    user=frappe.db.get_list("User Permission",filters={'user':doc.email,'allow':'Company'},fields={'*'})
    if user:
            frappe.get_doc(dict(
                    doctype = 'User Permission',
                    user = doc.email,
                    allow='Company',
                    name=user[0].name,
                    apply_to_all_doctypes=1
                    )).delete()
    
    if(doc.is_system_admin!=1):                
        up_doc=frappe.get_doc(dict(doctype = 'User Permission',
                            user=doc.email,
                            allow="Company",
                            for_value=doc.represents_company,
                            apply_to_all_doctypes=1
                )).insert(ignore_mandatory=True)
        up_doc.save()
